description: The Stonegate Guardian is an ancient construct built to protect sacred sites and ancient ruins. Its body is made of rough-hewn stone, and it stands vigilant, attacking any who dare trespass without proper rites.
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from non-magical attacks
languages: understands commands in Terran but cannot speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the Stonegate Guardian remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal stone statue.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
